Name: HeatMapLayer
Description: This samples customizes map objects to have move-dependent properties such as a heat signature.
Requirements: Must have a georeferenced map created in ConfigTool.
If turning a regular image into a georeferenced map, points should be very far apart.
Instructions: Open maps and select a map.
After selecting a map, zoom on the vehicles being tracked.
Result: Moving map objects being tracked with their paths tracked as black heat signatures.
Title: HeatMap Layer
